channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, the granddaughter of JFK, says she has a rare terminal cancer
item.description: In an essay in The New Yorker , Tatiana Schlossberg says she has acute myeloid leukemia. She also criticized her relative, Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

item.title: Most people are happy to do their own hearing tests at home. Could it relieve pressure on the NHS?
item.description: If the NHS recommended it, would people test their own hearing at home and use self-fitting hearing aids?

item.title: Researchers say a CDC website change misrepresents vaccine science
item.description: This week a CDC website briefly suggested a vaccine–autism link, prompting experts to urge the public to rely on credible medical guidance.
